content.raw:
It's working but using absolute paths for the meshes. For example:

Using the prefix `model://`is not working:

```
        <uri>model://coke_can/meshes/coke_can.dae</uri>
```

But using the absolute path I can see the mesh:

```
<uri>/home/ahcorde/.gazebo/models/coke_can/meshes/coke_can.dae</uri>
```

are there env variables to avoid this problem?

‌
